name: snap-events
description: A simple events plugin with Gutenberg block support
author: Tony Schappaugh

scripts.build: npm run build:block && npm run build:list && npm run build:editor
scripts.start: npm run start:block & npm run start:list & npm run start:editor
scripts.postbuild:block: cp src/blocks/events-grid/block.json build/blocks/events-grid/ && cp src/blocks/events-grid/render.php build/blocks/events-grid/ && rm -rf build/blocks/events-grid/blocks
scripts.postbuild:list: cp src/blocks/events-list/block.json build/blocks/events-list/ && cp src/blocks/events-list/render.php build/blocks/events-list/ && rm -rf build/blocks/events-list/blocks
